subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Two of Cespedes’s fingers were bruised by a pitch from the Phillies’ Justin De Fratus, and Matz, a potential starter in the postseason, continued to be bothered by a stiff upper back.
snippet: Two of Cespedes’s fingers were bruised by a pitch from the Phillies’ Justin De Fratus, and Matz, a potential starter in the postseason, continued to be bothered by a stiff upper back.
